          <title>
            <string language="fr">Organigramme du cycle de la roche</string>
            <string language="en">Rock cycle flowchart</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Felsenschleifeflußdiagramm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fluxograma do ciclo da rocha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diagramma di flusso del ciclo della roccia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάγραμμα ροής κύκλων βράχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Organigrama del ciclo de la roca</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cet organigramme représente le cycle complet de la roche. Ceci peut être utilisé en tant qu'exercice où il faudrait ajouter une légende.</string>
            <string language="en">This flowchart represents the complete rock cycle.  This can be used as an exercise for labelling.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la chaleur</string>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pression</string>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cycle de roche</string>
            <string language="en">rock cycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">érosion</string>
            <string language="en">weathering</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Flußdiagramm stellt die komplette 
Felsenschleife dar. Dieses kann als Übung für das Beschriften 
verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este fluxograma representa o ciclo completo da 
rocha. Isto pode ser usado como um exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma di flusso rappresenta il ciclo 
completo della roccia. Ciò può essere usata come esercitazione
per identificare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα ροής αντιπροσωπεύει τον πλήρη 
κύκλο βράχου. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση για 
το μαρκάρισμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este organigrama representa el ciclo completo de 
la roca. Esto se puede utilizar como ejercicio para etiquetar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Druck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
